data.name: Function
data.detailed_description:
Function is a community-driven, whole body fitness platform for VR gamers as envisioned by "DocScott" a Doctor of Physical Therapy and avid gamer.

Choose your path:
Fitness gamer - Upgrade your body through whole body strengthening programs.
Competitive gamer - The Function World Championships are open! Complete the fastest 100% speedrun on any workout routine and claim that workout's World Champion title.
Hardcore gamer - Titan workouts available for those seeking the ultimate challenge. Ultra-hardcore? Claim a Titan workout World Champion title to stand amongst the top elite!

The Function platform is the start of a multi-year mission to redefine how society gets physically fit. Lead by "DocScott", a Doctor of Physical Therapy, Function strives to gamify everything needed to keep the human body in top functional shape. With Function, you don't level up a game character, you level up your real life body!

Current version: Function is currently in the alpha stage of development. Core functionality is developed, with minimalistic aesthetics.

With an ambitious plan to grow to include hundreds of different exercises, Function will be the platform of choice for home VR/AR fitness gamers, for brick and mortar gyms to offer to their members, and for physical rehabilitation clinics to offer to their patients. Adapting and growing across future VR/AR headsets, the platform will bring gamified fitness to millions of users using the latest VR headsets and future AR smartglasses.

Become a fitness VR pioneer. Add Function to your wish list now!

data.short_description: Function is a whole body fitness platform for VR gamers that caters to casual, fitness, competitive and hardcore gamers.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
